The Peacock TV Extension enhances your viewing experience with additional features, including Picture in Picture (PiP) mode, brightness adjustment, and quick access to Peacock TV from any webpage.


Key Features:


Picture in Picture (PiP) Mode: Easily watch videos in a floating, resizable window that stays on top of other windows, allowing you to multitask while watching your favorite content.


Brightness Adjustment: Control the brightness of any webpage directly from the extension popup. Perfect for adjusting the viewing experience to your preferred lighting conditions.


Watch via Peacock: Right-click on any image on a webpage and select "Watch via Peacock" to quickly open Peacock TV, making it easier to access your favorite shows and movies.


How to Use:


After installing the extension, click on the extension icon in your browser toolbar to open the settings popup.
Use the brightness slider to adjust the brightness of the current webpage.
Click the PiP button to activate Picture in Picture mode for any video on the page.
Right-click on any image on a webpage and choose "Watch via Peacock" to be redirected to Peacock TV.
